ch.unifr.pai.twice.multipointer.client
Class MultiCursorController

java.lang.Object
  ch.unifr.pai.twice.multipointer.client.MultiCursorController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtendedWebsocketControl, WebsocketControl
public class MultiCursorController
extends java.lang.Object

Entry point for the multi pointer functionality. This is the functionality required by the shared screen instance to enable multiple mouse pointers.

Author:
Oliver Schmid
